description: Meat-free Monday never looked so good! This comforting, flavour-packed vegetarian dish will leave everyone feeling warm and satisfied.
name: Chilli & Soy Braised Pumpkin With Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 butternut pumpkin, halved lengthways, deseeded, peeled, cut into 5cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse rice under cold water. Place in a medium saucepan and add 1 1/2 cups cold water. Cover and simmer over low heat for 15 minutes or until rice is cooked. Remove pan from heat and stand, covered, for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add onion, chilli, ginger and garlic, then cook for 5 minutes, stirring, or until onion has softened.
Combine soy, stock cube and 1 cup warm water in a medium bowl. Pour mixture into frying pan. Add pumpkin and simmer, covered, for 15 minutes or until pumpkin is tender.
Divide rice among plates. Top with pumpkin mixture and serve scattered with coriander.
